name: Fox et al., Appellants, v. Williamsport Area School District
name_abbreviation: Fox v. Williamsport Area School District

judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
parties: Fox et al., Appellants, v. Williamsport Area School District.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Decree affirmed. Costs on appellants.
Mr. Justice Musmanno did not participate in the decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Clayton M. Food, appellant, in propria persona.
Henry G. Hager, 3rd, with him Nathan W. Stuart, Arthur R. G. Solmssen, and Stuart, Murphy, Hager cS Smith, and Saul, Etoing, Remick & Saul, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Fox et al., Appellants, v. Williamsport Area School District.
Argued October 4, 1968.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
reargument refused December 20, 1968.
Clayton M. Food, appellant, in propria persona.
Henry G. Hager, 3rd, with him Nathan W. Stuart, Arthur R. G. Solmssen, and Stuart, Murphy, Hager cS Smith, and Saul, Etoing, Remick & Saul, for appellees.
November 12, 1968:
